title: Python XGBoost Starter (0.209 Public MCC)
description: Following a similar recipe to lewis' R script (https://www.kaggle.com/cartographic/bosch-production-line-performance/bish-bash-xgboost), sampling the data to select features before running on the full set in order to stay within kaggle's memory limits. Here I add in the train_date data too. Please feel free to fork and improve.
description_lemmatized: following similar recipe lewis r script httpswwwkagglecomcartographicboschproductionlineperformancebishbashxgboost sampling data select feature running full set order stay within kaggles memory limit add train_date data please feel free fork improve
